item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The top 10% owns 87% of the stocks (90 points | 77 comments)
2. Firefly ‘Blue Ghost’ lunar lander touches down on the moon (387 points | 97 comments)
3. Made a scroll bar buddy that walks down the page when you scroll (249 points | 114 comments)
4. Man's brain turned to glass by hot Vesuvius ash cloud (36 points | 5 comments)
5. MIT 6.S184: Introduction to Flow Matching and Diffusion Models (20 points | 2 comments)
6. Solarpunk (308 points | 138 comments)
7. Gooey rubber that's slowly ruining old hard drives (180 points | 112 comments)
8. Show HN: Tangled – Git collaboration platform built on atproto (55 points | 2 comments)
9. BM25 in PostgreSQL (70 points | 12 comments)
10. Harvest the sun twice: Agrivoltaics promises sustainable food, energy and water (33 points | 7 comments)
11. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (262 points | 70 comments)
12. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (241 points | 54 comments)
13. Blender-made movie Flow takes Oscar (394 points | 50 comments)
14. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (225 points | 166 comments)
15. We in-housed our data labelling (24 points | 12 comments)
16. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (262 points | 91 comments)
17. Begrudgingly Choosing CBOR over MessagePack (31 points | 12 comments)
18. API design note: Beware of adding an "Other" enum value (156 points | 87 comments)
19. A Few of the Birds I Love (46 points | 11 comments)
20. Kaspersky exposes hidden malware on GitHub stealing personal data (123 points | 46 comments)
21. Rackmounting that which should not be rackmounted (25 points | 7 comments)
22. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (158 points | 82 comments)
23. Schools reviving shop class (197 points | 140 comments)
24. Show HN: Free Kindle Scribe Weekly Planner Creator (5 points | 2 comments)
25. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (204 points | 203 comments)
26. Show HN: Prompting LLMs in Bash scripts (55 points | 4 comments)
27. Losing a 5-year-long Illinois FOIA lawsuit for database schemas (75 points | 7 comments)
28. Gödel's theorem debunks the most important AI myth – Roger Penrose [video] (123 points | 244 comments)
29. Matt's Script Archive (1995) (104 points | 43 comments)
30. Turning my ESP32 into a DNS sinkhole to fight doomscrolling (89 points | 23 comments)
